short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anomali Copilot is the cybersecurity industry's leading Security Operations Center assistant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anomali Copilot is the cybersecurity industry's leading Security Operations Center assistant. Use Copilot's generative artificial intelligence to help summarize, save time, and provide insights into your research and investigations. Accelerate your team's ability to effectively detect, investigate, and respond to threats. Anomali Copilot parses and highlights all cyber threat information in your browser, including articles detailing the latest breach, raw intelligence feeds, or alerts in your Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) platform. 

Save time with generative AI: Quickly summarize information to respond to incidents faster.

Context at the point of use: Mouse over highlighted entities for a quick summary.

Know the impact: Integrates with Anomali Match and instantly detects whether highlighted observables have been seen in your environment.

Operationalize threat intelligence: Easily create threat bulletins and import observables to your security tools with the click of a button.

Investigate threats with ease: Add observables to investigations for further research and pivoting.
